citethispage-desc: Dodaje posebnu stranicu za [[Special:CiteThisPage|citiranje]] i poveznicu u okvir za pomagala
tooltip-citethispage: Informacije o tome kako citirati ovu stranicu
citethispage-badrevision: Grješka: izmjena stranice »$1« s ID-jem br. $2 nije pronađena.
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Bibliografski detalji za stranicu {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Naziv stranice: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Autori: Suradnici projekta {{SITENAME}} ({{SERVERNAME}}) * Nakladnik: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Nadnevak zadnjega uređivanja: {{REVISIONDAY}}. {{#timel:F|{{REVISIONMONTH1:R}}|hr}} {{REVISIONYEAR}}. {{#timel:(T)}} * Nadnevak preuzimanja: {{#timel: j. F Y. "u" H:i (T)| |hr}} * Trajna poveznica URL-a: {{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID inačice stranice: {{REVISIONID}}
== Tipovi citiranja za stranicu {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[m:w:en:APA style|Tip ''APA'']] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Preuzeto {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} iz {{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[m:w:en:The MLA style manual|Tip ''MLA'']] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[m:w:en:MHRA Style Guide|Tip ''MHRA'']] === Suradnici projekta {{SITENAME}} ({{SERVERNAME}}), '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [pristupljeno {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[m:w:en:The Chicago Manual of Style|Tip ''Chicago'']] === Suradnici projekta {{SITENAME}} ({{SERVERNAME}}), "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (Pristupljeno {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[m:w:en:Council of Science Editors|Tip ''CBE/CSE'']] === Suradnici projekta {{SITENAME}} ({{SERVERNAME}}). {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [citirano {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Dostupno na: {{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[m:w:en:Bluebook|Tip ''Bluebook'']] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (Posjećeno posljednji put {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Unos za [[m:w:en:BibTeX|BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; accessed {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{#timel:F||en}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Kada rabite URL-ove paketa [[m:w:en:LaTeX|LaTeX-a]] (\usepackage{url} negdje u uvodu/zaglavlju/preambuli) koji nastoje dati osobite i prikladno formatirane adrese, sljedeće je možda bolje: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; accessed {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{#timel:F||en}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
